it.polimi.se2019.controller

Class GameController

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.controller.GameController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TimerListener

    public class GameController
extends java.lang.Object
implements TimerListener
    defines the gamecontroller chich includes the definition of the map, the gamemode, the initial timer, the ammocard deck, the weapon card deck, the powerupcard deck, the remaining skulls, the deaths , the round manager, the last final frenzy player and the match
